Blocks Template

Banner's

Banner #1

html

<section class="banner grid-center">
  <div class="col-6-middle centered">
    <h2 class="big-bold"> This this a heading </h2>
    <h3 class="not-bold"> This is a sub-heading </h3>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

Banner #2

html

<section class="banner grid-right padded">
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle">
    <h3 class="big-bold">
          <span class="highlight"> Let's do </span> <br>
          <span class="highlight"> something </span> <br>
          <span class="highlight"> incredible </span>
        </h3>
    <a href="#" class="button inverted"> Let's do it!</a>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

Banner #3

html

<section class="banner grid-right padded">
  <div class="col-5_sm-12-middle light-bg padded-2">
    <h3> This is a heading </h3>
    <p> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. </p>
    <a href="#" class="button"> Let's do it!</a>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

Banner with Header 

html

<section class="banner-with-header grid-center padded">
  <header class="absolute-header grid">
    <div class="col-4-middle">
      <a href="/">
        <h2 class="logo"> LOGO </h2>
      </a>
    </div>
    <nav class="col-8-middle right">
      <a href="#"> Link </a>
      <a href="#"> Link </a>
      <a href="#"> Link </a>
      <a href="#"> Link </a>
    </nav>
  </header>
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle centered">
    <h2 class="big-bold"> This this a heading </h2>
    <h3 class="not-bold"> This is a sub-heading </h3>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner-with-header {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    padding-top: 6rem;
    min-height: 100vh;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

  .fixed {
    background-attachment: fixed;
  }

Fixed Banner 

html

<section class="banner grid-center fixed">
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle centered">
    <h2 class="big-bold"> This this a heading </h2>
    <h3 class="not-bold"> This is a sub-heading </h3>
  </div>
</section>

css

    .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

  .fixed {
    background-attachment: fixed;
  }

Split Banner

html

<section class="grid light-bg">
  <div class="banner col-6_sm-12">
  </div>
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle padded">
    <h2 class="big-bold"> This this a heading </h2>
    <p class="emphasis"> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. </p>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }

Full Split Banner

html

<section class="grid-right banner bg-pencils">
  <div class="col-6_sm-12-middle padded">
    <h2 class="big-bold"> This this a heading </h2>
    <p class="emphasis"> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. </p>
    <a href="#" class="button"> Sign me up!</a>
  </div>
</section>

css

  .banner {
    background-image: url('/images/adventure.jpg');
    background-size: cover;
    background-position: center;
    min-height: 80vh;
  }
